description:
A limited time SALE! 50% OFF! --------
IN THIS UPDATE:  * Brand NEW controls and new score ladder to climb - control your car using the touch mode * more performance improvements * bug fixes
--------
UPDATE HISTORY: * 10 brand NEW tracks,  * NEW challenges * friendlier blocker cars * performance improvements * bug fixes
--------
READY... SET... GO!
Race against the clock, or play in unique ghost mode in which you chase your own past best attempts. Compete for top positions in global leaderboards, watch other players' replays and test your skills racing their ghosts. Offline score support lets you play while you are away from the Internet and submit your progress at a later time.
